author: wolstaeb
title: DeFi+Catalyst🔥 Retroactive Finance
description: Para financiar rápidamente a los equipos de Catalyst con nuevos modelos de financiación construidos sobre curvas de vinculación ajustadas al riesgo, necesitamos una experiencia de usuario que la gente entienda.

f6_assessments.q0:
i strogly agree because the proposal is in line with the challenge above and looking at the solution by creating Conduct user research with behavioural data to design and prototype a mobile app that turns people into impact investors are very important.

f6_assessments.q1:
The proposer includes many referral links and documents to help us assess its feasibility, and is completely clear and detailed. He also attach some affiliate proposals, go with their team background I believe that they have a strong ability to finish the scope in this proposal well.

The only thing I recommend proposer should give more is the risk in their implementation plan.

f6_assessments.q0: proposed to solve the problem of designing and prototyping a mobile app that turns people into influential investors. This proposal is likely to succeed based on the definition of success set forth in the plan.
f6_assessments.q1: The team with experience running East Catalyst City Hall. as well as CA's experience and proposals funded in previous funds. Robert O'Brien is Co-Organizer of Catalyst Eastern Town Hall, a Catalyst Community initiative in Cardano that is considered a great start and provides credibility to the proposal. development roadmap, budget divided into separate categories, clear development plan
f6_assessments.q2: The proposal has a clear roadmap, timelines for completing items, and KPIs to check progress. clear, specific and workable solutions to the given problem

solution: Llevar a cabo una investigación de usuarios con datos de comportamiento para diseñar y crear un prototipo de una aplicación móvil que convierta a las personas en inversores de impacto.
experience: Diseño de producto y UX de sistemas de punto de venta, contabilidad y ERP. Inversión de impacto e ingeniería de software para mercados financieros.
